main.name: Cenab Batu Bora
main.description: I am a Computer Science and Math degree candidate from University of Alberta and I like to build new decentralized technologies. This page is my webpage and it is fully decentralized.
main.bio: I was born in Izmir, Turkey. I left my home at early age of 14 to study in different city. Now, I am in Edmonton, Canada, finishing my training to become computer scientist and developer. I am quite interested in Decentralization, Artificial Intelligence, Databases, Finance and Business Management. In my free time, I like to travel to different countries, play boardgames and spend time with my family.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: BSc Computing Science Major, Mathematics Minor
education.description: Theory of Computation, Operating Systems, Introduction to Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Computer Organization and Architecture, Introduction to File and Database Management, Algorithms I, Practical Programming Methodology Graph Theory.

work.title: Web Developer Contractor
work.description: Developed the Complete Energy Innovations’s new website using WordPress, managed SEO and implemented Google Analytic.

work.title: Head of Product Development
work.description: Succesfully designed a music focused livestreaming product for the MVP stage and built backend, frontend and livestreaming server of the platform using Google Cloud and RTMP technologies.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern at Department of Artificial Intelligence and Big Data
work.description: Worked on new data addition to database, developed scripts to manupilate large amount of data in Python and took part of developement of photo to text translation software for consumer electronics products.

work.title: Research Intern at Department of Computer Engineering
work.description: Took part in the research, development, and writing of the paper titled “the Agent-based Modeling and Simulation of the Sunn Pests and Wheat Relations”, a project I entered a competition with and “the Agent-based Modeling and Simulation of the Resistance of Bacteria to Antibiotics and presented the paper in international conferance in International Confernace on Engineering Technology and Innovation.

projects.title: Novelty
projects.category: Novelty is a project for CMPUT-301 team F20T07. The objective is to design a simple, attractive and easy-to-use Android application. It is a mobile application that allows owners to record the books they have and loan them to borrowers.In general, a user can be both an owner of their own books and a borrower of someone else's books. A borrower can borrow an available book by making a request for it. The owner can accept such a request. When the book is handed over, the book becomes borrowed. The owner can denote when a borrowed book is returned and available again

projects.title: Complete Energy Innovation
projects.category: Wordpress website for Complete Energy Innovations

projects.title: ICETI'17
projects.category: Agent-based Modeling and Simulation of the Sunn Pest-Wheat Relation and of the Struggle: Simulated the natural ongoing of a sunn-pest bug in a wheat field and certain conditions such as predators, pest control, humidity,weather conditions etc in Java. Research findings are also presented by me in University of Sarajevo in ICETI’17.

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis of Amazon Reviews
projects.category: Designed and developed a script that does sentiment analysis of the Amazon reviews of a designated product using a prepared text file of word analysis gotten using Word2Vec, Gaussian NB algorithm and web-scraping.
